  __pyx_v_num_layers = __pyx_t_1;

 070:     cdef double xw
 071:     cdef layer_t lay_here, lay_prev
+072:     for i in range(1, num_layers): # for each layer
  __pyx_t_1 = __pyx_v_num_layers;
  __pyx_t_2 = __pyx_t_1;
  for (__pyx_t_3 = 1; __pyx_t_3 < __pyx_t_2; __pyx_t_3+=1) {
    __pyx_v_i = __pyx_t_3;

+073:         lay_here = network.lay[i] # store actual layer (just for compat code)
    __pyx_v_lay_here = (__pyx_v_network.lay[__pyx_v_i]);

+074:         lay_prev = network.lay[i-1] # store previous layer (just for compact code)
    __pyx_v_lay_prev = (__pyx_v_network.lay[(__pyx_v_i - 1)]);

+075:         for j in range(lay_here.num_neu): # for each neuron of acutual layer
    __pyx_t_4 = __pyx_v_lay_here.num_neu;
    __pyx_t_5 = __pyx_t_4;
    for (__pyx_t_6 = 0; __pyx_t_6 < __pyx_t_5; __pyx_t_6+=1) {
      __pyx_v_j = __pyx_t_6;

+076:             lay_here.neu[j].net = lay_here.neu[j].bias # First add bias to the net
      __pyx_t_7 = (__pyx_v_lay_here.neu[__pyx_v_j]).bias;
      (__pyx_v_lay_here.neu[__pyx_v_j]).net = __pyx_t_7;

+077:             for k in range(lay_prev.num_neu): # For each neuron of previus layer
      __pyx_t_8 = __pyx_v_lay_prev.num_neu;
      __pyx_t_9 = __pyx_t_8;
      for (__pyx_t_10 = 0; __pyx_t_10 < __pyx_t_9; __pyx_t_10+=1) {
        __pyx_v_k = __pyx_t_10;

 078:                 # Select the w of the connection j of the neuron k (prevoius
 079:                 # layer) and multiply it by the out of that neuron (wk * xk)
+080:                 xw = lay_prev.neu[k].out_weights[j] * lay_prev.neu[k].actv
        __pyx_v_xw = (((__pyx_v_lay_prev.neu[__pyx_v_k]).out_weights[__pyx_v_j]) * (__pyx_v_lay_prev.neu[__pyx_v_k]).actv);

 081:                 # implement sum_k(wk*xk) relative to neuron j (actual layer)
+082:                 lay_here.neu[j].net += xw
        __pyx_t_11 = __pyx_v_j;
        (__pyx_v_lay_here.neu[__pyx_t_11]).net = ((__pyx_v_lay_here.neu[__pyx_t_11]).net + __pyx_v_xw);
      }

 083:             # Update the output of the actual neuron with the activation
 084:             # function on the net
+085:             lay_here.neu[j].actv = lay_here.activation_f(lay_here.neu[j].net)
      (__pyx_v_lay_here.neu[__pyx_v_j]).actv = __pyx_v_lay_here.activation_f((__pyx_v_lay_here.neu[__pyx_v_j]).net);
    }
  }

 090:     cdef int i, j, k, rev

 094: 
 095:     ### Last Layer ###
+096:     for j in range(lay.num_neu): # For each neuron of last layer
  __pyx_t_1 = __pyx_v_lay.num_neu;
  __pyx_t_2 = __pyx_t_1;
  for (__pyx_t_3 = 0; __pyx_t_3 < __pyx_t_2; __pyx_t_3+=1) {
    __pyx_v_j = __pyx_t_3;

 097:         # Compute the delta: (d-o)*f'(net)
+098:         lay.neu[j].dnet = (labels[j] - lay.neu[j].actv) * lay.derivative_f(lay.neu[j].net)
    __pyx_t_4 = __pyx_v_j;

+099:         for k in range(lay_back.num_neu): # for each neuron of prev. layer

      __pyx_v_k = __pyx_t_7;

 100:             # Compute dw_back: delta*input = delta*out_prev
+101:             lay_back.neu[k].dw[j] += lay.neu[j].dnet * lay_back.neu[k].actv
      __pyx_t_8 = __pyx_v_k;
      __pyx_t_9 = __pyx_v_j;

 102:             # Store the value w_prev * delta for next steps
+103:             lay_back.neu[k].dactv += lay_back.neu[k].out_weights[j] * lay.neu[j].dnet

    }

 104:         # Compute dbias just like delta * x0_prev = delta
+105:         lay.neu[j].dbias += lay.neu[j].dnet
    __pyx_t_5 = __pyx_v_j;

+159: cdef double compute_error(network_t network, double[:] labels):
static double __pyx_f_8training_8training_compute_error(struct __pyx_t_8topology_8topology_network_t __pyx_v_network, __Pyx_memviewslice __pyx_v_labels) {
  double __pyx_v_error_single;
  double __pyx_v_sum_error;
  double __pyx_v_quadratic_error;
  int __pyx_v_i;
  int __pyx_v_num_layers;
  double __pyx_r;
  __Pyx_RefNannyDeclarations
  __Pyx_RefNannySetupContext("compute_error", 0);
/* … */
  /* function exit code */
  __pyx_L0:;
  __Pyx_RefNannyFinishContext();
  return __pyx_r;
}

+160:     cdef double error_single, sum_error = 0, quadratic_error
  __pyx_v_sum_error = 0.0;

+161:     cdef int i, num_layers = network.num_layers
  __pyx_t_1 = __pyx_v_network.num_layers;
  __pyx_v_num_layers = __pyx_t_1;

+162:     for i in range(network.lay[num_layers-1].num_neu):
  __pyx_t_1 = (__pyx_v_network.lay[(__pyx_v_num_layers - 1)]).num_neu;
  __pyx_t_2 = __pyx_t_1;
  for (__pyx_t_3 = 0; __pyx_t_3 < __pyx_t_2; __pyx_t_3+=1) {
    __pyx_v_i = __pyx_t_3;

+163:         error_single = labels[i] - network.lay[num_layers-1].neu[i].actv
    __pyx_t_4 = __pyx_v_i;
    __pyx_v_error_single = ((*((double *) ( /* dim=0 */ (__pyx_v_labels.data + __pyx_t_4 * __pyx_v_labels.strides[0]) ))) - ((__pyx_v_network.lay[(__pyx_v_num_layers - 1)]).neu[__pyx_v_i]).actv);

+164:         quadratic_error = error_single*error_single
    __pyx_v_quadratic_error = (__pyx_v_error_single * __pyx_v_error_single);

+165:         sum_error += quadratic_error
    __pyx_v_sum_error = (__pyx_v_sum_error + __pyx_v_quadratic_error);
  }

+166:     return sum_error
  __pyx_r = __pyx_v_sum_error;
  goto __pyx_L0;

 167:
